title: Lemon and courgette rice
ingredients: ['500ml vegetable stock, warmed', 'juice of 2 lemons', '1 tablespoon soft brown sugar', '300g long grain rice', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1 large white onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '2 courgettes, thinly sliced', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
